name: SalaryBox
headline: Gusto for India
description:
Salarybox is a payroll app for small businesses in India. There are 63 Million small businesses in India and 90% still manage payroll manually. Today, business owners manage attendance on pen-paper; calculate salary on excel and pay employees in cash.

Using our App, the entire process can be performed with the click of a button. Our app reduces the time taken to process payroll from 5 days to 5 minutes. 

We use Payroll data to build a credit profile of 300 Million+ blue-collar workers and improve access to financial products.
generated_description:
### SalaryBox: Simplifying Payroll for Indian SMEs

**Overview:**
Founded in 2021 and part of Y Combinator's S21 batch, SalaryBox is becoming a game-changer for the 63 million small businesses in India still stuck in the dark ages of payroll management. With 90% managing their processes manually—think pen-paper attendance and cash payments—SalaryBox offers a seamless solution to streamline these outdated practices.

**Mission:**
The mission of SalaryBox is simple yet impactful: to be the "Gusto for India." They're aiming to revolutionize how payroll and employee management are handled across the small business landscape.

**What They Offer:**
SalaryBox is an intuitive payroll app designed specifically for small businesses. It turns a five-day payroll process into a mere five minutes with a few clicks. This remarkable efficiency not only saves time but also enhances accuracy and compliance.

Their features include:
- **Attendance Management:** From biometric systems to mobile tracking, businesses can easily monitor employee time.
- **Payroll Processing:** Automates calculations, takes care of taxes, and ensures payments are compliant with laws.
- **Employee Management:** Tools for onboarding, verifying employee identity, and managing documentation.
- **Advanced Financial Products:** SalaryBox uses payroll data to create credit profiles for over 300 million blue-collar workers, helping them access better financial services.

**Team & Location:**
Based in Gurugram, India, SalaryBox has a compact team of eight, allowing them to maintain agility and responsiveness to customer needs.

**Industry Focus:**
Tagged as a fintech, SaaS, and B2B solution, SalaryBox is suitable for various sectors, making it versatile for any small business.

**User Experience:**
The user feedback is enthusiastic. Clients describe SalaryBox as a "reliable assistant" that not only simplifies payroll but also tackles real-time employee management challenges effortlessly.

**Why it Matters:**
In a country where small businesses form the backbone of the economy, streamlining payroll processing can significantly impact productivity and financial health. By addressing the inefficiencies of manual payroll, SalaryBox is paving the way for smarter, tech-driven employee management in India.

If you're running a small business in India and tired of the hassle of payroll and employee tracking, perhaps it's time to check out SalaryBox. With a robust set of features, security, and cloud backups, switching to this system could save you substantial time and improve compliance.

For more details or to get started, visit their website: [SalaryBox](https://www.salarybox.in/).
